Notes: Migration costs for India to UAE (DHA/DOH/MOH route). Licensing exam fees vary by authority: DHA Dubai (AED 2700-3500) DOH Abu Dhabi (AED 2500-3500) MOH Northern Emirates (similar range). DataFlow verification is mandatory for primary source verification of Indian medical degrees. OET/IELTS not mandatory for DHA but recommended for DOH/MOH. Work visa costs vary significantly: basic employment visa (AED 3300) vs Golden Visa 5-10 year (AED 10000-12000). Emirates ID is mandatory for all residents. Housing deposit typically 1-2 months rent (varies by city/accommodation type). Health insurance mandatory as of 2025 - employer-sponsored or self-paid initial months. Total costs calculated at AED/INR = 24.70 exchange rate. Timeline: 2-4 months from DataFlow submission to license approval. Additional hidden costs: Document attestation (MEA + UAE Embassy in India: INR 5000-10000) courier/shipping (INR 3000-5000). Note: Many hospitals sponsor work visa costs reducing out-of-pocket migration expense by ~INR 150000-400000.
